info.name: Steam Powered User Forums Alternate Theme
info.description: This is like a mix between the older theme that many people loved, and the newer theme that not everybody enjoys. It uses the colors from the old theme, and of course it removes the bold text that's been driving everybody crazy. Perhaps in a later version I'll try and figure out a fix to change the color of the quick reply box, since I know most people do not like how much it stands out.
